TestCase.name: testAggWithMicroBatch
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[b], select=[b, COUNT(DISTINCT a) AS EXPR$1, MAX(b) AS EXPR$2, SUM(c) AS EXPR$3]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[b, a, c]) StreamExecMicroBatchAssigner(interval=[1000ms]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testAggAfterUnionWithMicroBatch
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a], select=[a, SUM(b) AS EXPR$1, COUNT(DISTINCT c) AS EXPR$2]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) StreamExecUnion(union all=[a, b, c]) StreamExecMicroBatchAssigner(interval=[1000ms]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_1]]) StreamExecMicroBatchAssigner(interval=[1000ms]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_2]])

TestCase.name: testGroupbyWithoutWindow
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[EXPR$0]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[b], select=[b, COUNT(a) AS EXPR$0]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[b, a]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testDistinctAfterAggregate
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecCalc(select=[EXPR$0]) StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[b], select=[b, COUNT(a) AS EXPR$0]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[b]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[b, a]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testCountDistinct
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a, b], select=[a, b, COUNT(DISTINCT c) AS EXPR$2]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a, b]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, c]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testDistinct
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a, b, c], select=[a, b, c]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a, b, c]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, c]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_0]])

TestCase.name: testLocalGlobalAggAfterUnion
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecGlobalGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a], select=[a, Final_SUM(sum$0) AS EXPR$1, Final_COUNT(DISTINCT distinct$0) AS EXPR$2]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) StreamExecUnion(union all=[a, sum$0, count$1, distinct$0]) StreamExecLocalGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a], select=[a, Partial_SUM(c) AS sum$0, Partial_COUNT(distinct$0) AS count$1, Partial_DISTINCT(b) AS distinct$0]) StreamExecCalc(select=[a, c, b]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_1]]) StreamExecLocalGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a], select=[a, Partial_SUM(c) AS sum$0, Partial_COUNT(distinct$0) AS count$1, Partial_DISTINCT(b) AS distinct$0]) StreamExecCalc(select=[a, c, b]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_2]])

TestCase.name: testAggWithFilterClause
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a], select=[a, SUM(b) FILTER $f2 AS EXPR$1, COUNT(DISTINCT c) FILTER $f4 AS EXPR$2, MAX(b) AS EXPR$3]) StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a]]) StreamExecCalc(select=[a, b, IS TRUE(=(c, 'A')) AS $f2, c, IS TRUE(d) AS $f4]) StreamExecScan(table=[[_DataStreamTable_1]])
